abilityText:
At the start of the game, place a [HONEY] counter behind your player shield.

When you select a monster action for any monster, you may select the action using the [HONEY] counter. If you do, that monster action gains
+2[SPD],
then discard the [HONEY] counter. ([HONEY] counters are open information.)
promiseDescription: Boltblebee's role heavily depends on your team's composition. As an opener, Boltbebee can either amass honey with Pollinate or paralzye enemy monsters with Swarm. As a closer, Boltblebee can outpace monsters by gobbling up your honey stores with Nectear. However, Boltbebee is least effective in the midgame.
